name: Baja Fish Tacos from KRAFT®
author: Kraft
summary: Spicy seasoned fish fillets are quickly pan fried, sprinkled with lime juice, and served in warm corn tortillas with a creamy lime-seasoned coleslaw blend and shredded cheese.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon TACO BELL® HOME ORIGINALS® Taco Seasoning Mix
⅓ cup KRAFT Mayo Real Mayonnaise
½ cup KRAFT Mexican Style Shredded Four Cheese
directions: lime juice; sprinkle with seasoning mix
Cooking in skillet sprayed with cooking spray on medium heat 3 to 3-1/2 min
on each side or until fish flakes easily with fork, drizzling fish with 1 Tbsp
of the remaining lime juice for the last minute
Flake with fork into bite-size pieces
Mix mayo, remaining lime juice and 1 Tbsp
Add to coleslaw blend; mix lightly
Top tortillas with coleslaw, fish, cheese and remaining cilantro
